scenes.description: Kureiji Ollie and Anya Melfissa discuss the dangerous stage setting with sand and weapons and their collaboration on the choreography.
Pavolia Reine and Anya Melfissa talk about the song choice and the peacock-themed stage design.

subtitles.original: Wah, nahan-nahan nge-dance di sini agak bahaya ya kawan-kawan, jangan ditiru.
subtitles.english: Wow, holding back on dancing here is a bit dangerous friends, don't copy this.

subtitles.original: Benar, bahaya dan sulit lho. Ini soalnya pasir semua.
subtitles.english: True, it's dangerous and difficult. It's because of all this sand.

subtitles.original: Iya, ini pasir dan banyak senjata juga. Hayo gimana tuh nge-dance-nya?
subtitles.english: Yeah, it's sand and many weapons too. So how was the dancing?

subtitles.original: Ya kita latihan dan lain-lainnya guys, pokoknya...
subtitles.english: Well we practiced and all that guys, anyway...

subtitles.original: ...kita berjuang dengan sangat keras. Itu tadi koreografi ada yang Anya buat...
subtitles.english: ...we fought very hard. That choreography earlier, some were made by Anya...

subtitles.original: ...ada Ollie yang buat juga. Ya kita berkolaborasi.
subtitles.english: ...some were made by Ollie too. Yeah we collaborated.

subtitles.original: Ya ini nyanyi bareng, ya berkolaborasi.
subtitles.english: Yeah this singing together, yeah collaborating.

subtitles.original: Hmm... Oke, setelah ini masih ada banyak lho kolaborasinya, bukan cuma ini aja.
subtitles.english: Hmm... Okay, after this there's still a lot of collaborations, not just this one.

subtitles.original: Yes! Setelah ini akan ada stage selanjutnya!
subtitles.english: Yes! After this there will be the next stage!

subtitles.original: Wah, stage apa itu? Stage apa?
subtitles.english: Wow, what stage is that? What stage?

subtitles.original: Makanya nonton sampai habis ya guys!
subtitles.english: That's why watch until the end guys!

subtitles.original: Yay! Kalau gitu langsung ke lagu selanjutnya!
subtitles.english: Yay! If so, straight to the next song!

subtitles.original: アリンコシックな日常に　付き合う朝
subtitles.english: An ant-chic morning I deal with daily

subtitles.original: 八百万の嘘を　笑うベッド
subtitles.english: A bed that laughs at eight million lies

subtitles.original: どうしようもないけど　気が狂う人の
subtitles.english: It can't be helped, but as someone who's going mad

subtitles.original: 振りをしている　君を見ている
subtitles.english: I'm watching you, pretending

subtitles.original: 安寧放蕩だから　切り捨てた
subtitles.english: Because of peaceful profligacy, I cut it off

subtitles.original: 八畳サイズを　さらうドクト
subtitles.english: A "docto" that sweeps away an eight-tatami size

subtitles.original: 申し訳ないけど　すれ違う度に
subtitles.english: I'm sorry, but every time we pass each other

subtitles.original: 無意識に愛を　強いているわ
subtitles.english: I'm unconsciously forcing love on you

subtitles.original: 饒舌な暴走　手入力の独創
subtitles.english: A talkative rampage, a manually input creation

subtitles.original: モラトリアム的　人間最下位
subtitles.english: A moratorium-like bottom-tier human

subtitles.original: 根っからの鑑賞材
subtitles.english: A decoration to the core

subtitles.original: 食べてすぐ寝て牛になる
subtitles.english: Eat and then sleep immediately, becoming a cow

subtitles.original: 起きてまた寝て人非人
subtitles.english: Wake up and sleep again, a heartless beast

subtitles.original: マーシャル・マキシマイザー　マキシマイザー
subtitles.english: Marshall Maximizer, Maximizer

subtitles.original: 求愛待って焦がした　フィルムの今日を
subtitles.english: Waiting for courtship, burning today's film

subtitles.original: なんてことない生きて　しまうのだが
subtitles.english: I end up living a meaningless life, however

subtitles.original: 怨みも回る　元自堕落ね
subtitles.english: Grudges also revolve, originally self-indulgent, right?

subtitles.original: 錯誤さ錯誤さ　ステイ
subtitles.english: It's a mistake, a mistake, stay

subtitles.original: 傲慢な振る舞い　取り戻したい
subtitles.english: Arrogant behavior, I want to take it back

subtitles.original: でも演技が降る　落ちる落ちる
subtitles.english: But the acting falls, falling, falling

subtitles.original: 払くらえアンバランス回　ファーラウェイ
subtitles.english: Eat this unbalanced round, far away

subtitles.english: It can't be helped, so to someone who's going mad

subtitles.original: 真似をしている　君へ
subtitles.english: I'm imitating you

subtitles.original: 簡単な言葉　信じていたいなら
subtitles.english: If you want to believe simple words

subtitles.original: 足りないよ
subtitles.english: They're not enough

subtitles.original: 申し訳ないなら　擦れ合う通りに
subtitles.english: If you're sorry, as we rub against each other

subtitles.original: 無意識に愛を　求めなさいよ
subtitles.english: Go on and seek love unconsciously

subtitles.english: And try

subtitles.english: Grudges also revolve, a disaster-waiting game

subtitles.english: Maximizer, Maximizer

subtitles.original: マキシマイザー　マキシマイザー
subtitles.english: Maximizer, Maximizer

subtitles.original: Wah! Akhirnya!
subtitles.english: Wow! Finally!

subtitles.original: Akhirnya!
subtitles.english: Finally!

subtitles.original: Marshall Maximizer bareng Anya Melfissa!
subtitles.english: Marshall Maximizer with Anya Melfissa!

subtitles.original: Aku kan ya pernah cover ini ya...
subtitles.english: I covered this before...

subtitles.original: ...terus aku agak kaget Reine milih lagu ini. Wah senang banget.
subtitles.english: ...and I was a bit surprised Reine chose this song. Wow, so happy.

subtitles.original: Aku tuh, aku tuh senang banget sama cover-nya Anya. Jadi tuh mumpung ada kesempatan...
subtitles.english: I really, I really like Anya's cover. So while there's an opportunity...

subtitles.original: ...akhirnya aku tuh harus kayak, "Aku harus nyanyi Marshall Maximizer sama Anya di stage!"
subtitles.english: ...finally I was like, "I must sing Marshall Maximizer with Anya on stage!"

subtitles.original: Iya, tadi... tadi itu keren banget pokoknya kita.
subtitles.english: Yeah, earlier... earlier it was so cool.

subtitles.original: Iya, spicy gila sih.
subtitles.english: Yeah, crazy spicy.

subtitles.original: Gila! Dan ini stage-nya keren banget guys.
subtitles.english: Crazy! And this stage is really cool, guys.

subtitles.original: Iya dong, ini adalah stage-nya aku kali ini.
subtitles.english: Of course, this is my stage this time.

subtitles.original: Meraknya lucu!
subtitles.english: The peacock is cute!

subtitles.original: Ada burung merak di sininya, terus di bawahnya juga ada lho sebenarnya.
subtitles.english: There's a peacock here, and below it there's one too actually.

subtitles.original: Iya di bawahnya, ini... ini kaca ya? Aku sebenarnya agak takut ya soalnya aku kan keris ya...
subtitles.english: Yeah below it, is this... is this glass? I'm actually a bit afraid because I'm a kris...

subtitles.original: ...jadi kalau nge-dance kan deg-degan gitu. Pecah nggak ya?
subtitles.english: ...so when dancing I'm nervous. Will it break?

subtitles.original: Tenang, tenang, nggak pecah. Sebelumnya udah dipesenin pokoknya harus tahan, tahan keris pokoknya.
subtitles.english: Calm down, it won't break. It's been ordered beforehand that it must withstand daggers.

subtitles.original: Aduh makasih banget, soalnya kalau pecah bisa aku disuruh ganti.
subtitles.english: Oh thank you so much, because if it breaks I might be asked to replace it.

subtitles.original: Nggak dong, nggak dong.
subtitles.english: No, no.

subtitles.original: Gantinya dalam bentuk nyanyi sama Reine.
subtitles.english: The replacement is in the form of singing with Reine.
